thread.title: Bruce McNaught
thread.title_full: Poseidon Expeditions reviewed by Bruce McNaught

author: Bruce McNaught
title: Bruce McNaught
text: The trip was fantastic thanks, and I really can’t think of any useful suggestions to improve the experience. The excursions every morning and afternoon were very well organised, often with flexibility in the return time. Personally, I was expecting to really struggle with sea-sickness crossing the Drake, but I had absolutely no problem. I assume that the ship's stabilisers helped, as well as ‘the pills’ (Stugeron), but we were also fortunate in having good weather, ie low swell.
